messageBody:
So said Michael McCrann on 2002-11-12

>It seems to me that it is quite hard to test MDB's as they are
>asyncronous. Has anyone got any stratagies for unit testing them? Or
>possibly, do you think that they shouldn't be unit tested at all, only
>tested at the functional/system testing level.

Not knowing MDBs intimately, I would offer the general suggestion to
move as much of the logic as possible into a plain Java class and test
that class. No need for EJB containers and the like. The MDB then
becomes glue code that may be too simple to break on its own.
